title: Scorpio Soulmate Compatibility: Which Sign Is Their Ideal Life Partner?

steps.title: Taurus and Scorpio are the perfect blend of passion and loyalty.
steps.content: Taurus and Scorpio are the perfect blend of passion and loyalty. This pair is opposite one another on the zodiac wheel, which is why they have contrasting yet complementary personalities! Sweet-natured, laid-back Taurus can bring out Scorpio’s softer, more sensitive side, while confident Scorpio can encourage Taurus to take charge and allow themselves to be assertive. On top of that, both signs are steadfast and loyal, ensuring their connection can last a lifetime. [1] X Research source Emotional Connection: Strong. An earth sign like Taurus is more logical than an emotional water sign like Scorpio, but they can build a strong connection as long as they’re mindful of one another’s differences. Sexual Chemistry: Exceptional! Scorpio is ruled by Mars, the planet of passion, making them one of the most sexual zodiac signs. Taurus is ruled by Venus, the planet of love, making them very sensual. Together, they’re a perfect fit. Trust: Very strong. Both signs are fixed, which means they’re loyal and reliable, so they’ll easily learn to trust one another. Communication: Strong. Taurus and Scorpio communicate well overall, though being fixed signs makes them very stubborn—which may make it difficult to resolve conflicts. Areas to improve: This headstrong pair may need to learn to compromise to ensure that conflicts don't escalate. Reader Poll: We asked 380 wikiHow readers about what quality they value most in a partner and 49% of them said loyalty and dependability . [Take Poll] So it’s a great sign that Taurus and Scorpio have such a strong potential for loyalty!

steps.title: Cancer and Scorpio can naturally attune to one another’s emotions.
steps.content: Cancer and Scorpio can naturally attune to one another’s emotions. The emotional connection between Cancer and Scorpio soulmates is immediate and intense; this pair will understand one another the way few other pairs can, and their shared emotional intelligence can help them navigate even the most difficult conflicts. Nurturing Cancer can balance Scorpio’s moodiness and make them feel truly loved! [2] X Research source Emotional Connection: Exceptional. Cancer is ruled by the Moon, the planet of innermost emotions, which adds to Cancer’s emotional depth and ability to relate to Scorpio. They also share Scorpio’s water sign intuition. Sexual Chemistry: Strong. Cancer’s nurturing approach to intimacy can help Scorpio relax in the bedroom, while Cancer will be attracted to Scorpio’s intensity and passion. Trust: Very strong. This pair will always feel safe and secure together because they can easily find the soft and sensitive heart beneath the other’s reserved, protective exterior. Communication: Very strong. Cancer is a cardinal sign, which means they’re instigators. They like to start new projects—while fixed Scorpio has the drive to help them see those projects to completion. Areas to improve: Scorpio is prone to mood swings, and Cancer may get insecure, but they can overcome both issues. Cancer’s nurturing nature can soothe Scorpio, and Scorpio’s intense loyalty can ease Cancer’s insecurities.

steps.title: Pisces and Scorpio match one another’s emotional intensity.
steps.content: Pisces and Scorpio match one another’s emotional intensity. As fellow water signs, Pisces and Scorpio are both intuitive, sensitive, and deeply emotional, resulting in a caring and loving relationship for both signs. They’ll both have a positive influence on one another: dreamy, imaginative Pisces can help Scorpio see the bright side of life, while down-to-earth Scorpio can keep Pisces grounded in reality. [3] X Research source Emotional Connection: Exceptional. Their shared element (water) makes it easy for this pair to attune to one another’s emotions and understand what the other is feeling. Sexual Chemistry: Strong. Pisces is ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and creativity, while Scorpio’s passion stems from Mars. When passion meets creativity, the result is an exciting intimate connection! Trust: Average. This pair will enjoy finding a partner that understands them so intuitively, and they can learn to trust one another based on that connection. Communication: Very strong, Pisces is a mutable sign, which means they’re very flexible. Between Pisces’ adaptability and Scorpio’s drive and wherewithal, this pair can clear any obstacle together. Areas to improve: Pisces can be indecisive and Scorpio can be controlling, which may hurt their trust in one another. If Scorpio curb their domineering side and Pisces can commit to the relationship, this pair can go the distance!

steps.title: Virgo and Scorpio make a resourceful and considerate couple.
steps.content: Virgo and Scorpio make a resourceful and considerate couple. Scorpio’s sensitivity and Virgo’s attention to detail help them be caring and supportive of one another, and both are resourceful, so they make an amazing team in the workplace. They’re also introverted, meaning they’ll enjoy private time together and know how to give one another space. Overall, their bond is a harmonious blend of passion and practicality! [4] X Research source Emotional Connection: Strong. Scorpio is more emotional than logical Virgo, but Virgo is a mutable sign, which helps them to adapt to Scorpio’s intensity and easily navigate their differences. Sexual Chemistry: Average. Virgo is more reserved and cautious in the bedroom than wild, passionate Scorpio. Trust: Very strong. Scorpio’s fixed modality makes them loyal. And, as an earth sign, Virgo also has a very dependable nature. Communication: Exceptional. Virgo is an earth sign ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication, so they’ll have no problem connecting and communicating with a sign as secretive as Scorpio. Areas to improve: They may need to work on physical intimacy a bit. Virgo may be more reserved than Scorpio, but thankfully, an intuitive Scorpio can draw out Virgo’s wild side over time.

steps.title: Capricorn and Scorpio make an excellent power couple.
steps.content: Capricorn and Scorpio make an excellent power couple. Both signs are known for their ambition, and together, they can help one another achieve their goals. They may take some time to open up, as both can be reserved at the beginning of a relationship—but they’ll share a powerful connection once they do. Scorpio can help Capricorn embrace their emotional side, and Cap can help Scorpio be a little more logical when necessary. [5] X Research source Emotional Connection: Strong. Even though Cap is very guarded and unemotional at first, Scorpio is the perfect sign to help them become more emotionally engaged as they learn to trust each other. Sexual Chemistry: Exceptional. Cap is strong, fierce, and energetic in the bedroom, which is sure to excite a passionate, intense Scorpio. Communication: Average. As a cardinal sign, Capricorn is all about taking charge and chasing success with their grand ideas, while fixed Scorpio can help them stay on task. Trust: Very strong. Capricorn is an earth sign ruled by Saturn, the planet of responsibilities, which helps them build a trusting relationship with Scorpio—who appreciates Cap’s sense of loyalty and dependability. Areas to improve: This pair may not understand their attraction at first because neither is able to open up easily. If they’re patient , they may realize that they have a ton to talk about; both signs are prone to having deep, philosophical discussions about life.
